fastXmlPull.name: XML for Script's Fast XML Pull Parser
fastXmlPull.description: A fast XML pull parser based on source code from the XML for Script project. Used by the Renderer to parse templates.

jQuery.name: jQuery
jQuery.description: The jQuery core JavaScript library, used as the foundation for Infusion.

jQueryScrollToPlugin.name: jQuery scrollTo Plugin
jQueryScrollToPlugin.description: Provides a way to scroll the browser's view to a specific element or location on the page.

jQueryTouchPunchPlugin.name: jQuery Touch Punch Plugin
jQueryTouchPunchPlugin.description: Provides touch event support for jQuery UI.

jQueryUI.name: jQuery UI
jQueryUI.description: jQuery UI Widgets and Interactions. Includes the following: Core; Interactions: draggable, resizable; Widgets: button, checkboxradio, controlgroup, dialog, mouse, slider, tabs, and tooltip

normalize.name: normalize.css
normalize.description: Normalize.css makes browsers render all elements more consistently and in line with modern standards. It precisely targets only the styles that need normalizing.

url-polyfill.name: url-polyfill
url-polyfill.description: Polyfill URL and URLSearchParams to match last WHATWG specifications
